h2_title: Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - First Encounter
content: To commence the fight against the Venom Daoist, you'll need to bat the Odd Cocoon around like a pinata for awhile, until about half of its health bar is gone. Once your attack gets bounced away, the Venom Daoist will emerge, sporting two swords and eight arms to tear you apart.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - First Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
To commence the fight against the Venom Daoist, you'll need to bat the Odd Cocoon around like a pinata for awhile, until about half of its health bar is gone. Once your attack gets bounced away, the Venom Daoist will emerge, sporting two swords and eight arms to tear you apart.
